name: Avoco
desc: Avoco is designed to encourage healthy, balanced eating while promoting eco-conscious habits through mindful food choices that reduce environmental impact.

name: The Shts
desc: The Shts is an exceptional collection of 1131 one-of-a-kind NFTs that brings together the creative forces of Smuzzies and DataB4Dishonor. This remarkable collaboration is further enhanced by its integration with the $SHT token, adding a unique dimension to the collection.

name: 1M PXL
desc: A Million decentralized pixels universe. Claim your place on-chain and support your favorite dapps.

name: NoPaper
desc: Shop and Earn!, Your groceries, now rewarding the planet.

name: B3TTERY
desc: An AI-powered DApp that promotes smart and sustainable charging.

name: Bubbly Caps Dapp
desc: Welcome to Bubbly Caps — a Circular NFT collection brewed on VeChain. Collect bold cap designs inspired by the Bubbles culture layer: refill energy, eco momentum, and community identity. Complete the full set, and flex your collection across the ecosystem.

name: Sproutly Inc.
desc: Sproutly is a regenerative impact game that connects everyday digital actions to real-world tree planting and CO₂ removal. Players care for virtual trees inside the game, and these actions are directly linked to verified agroforestry projects on the ground. Sproutly’s purpose is to make climate-positive behavior accessible and engaging, while transparently funding long-term tree growth and measurable carbon removal. The app bridges play and impact by turning attention, time, and community participation into tangible environmental outcomes.

name: Stella Pay
desc: Unlock everyday purchases backed by your VeChain assets.

name: WoV Marketplace
desc: The first gas-free, green NFT platform built on the VeChain blockchain
